list.name: Tutored Project - Scudo
list.description:
You can stream like Twitch or Youtube, but this project is more focused on the protection of your videos.
You can record your videos on the cloud and watch it later, it is a security to not lost your video if you are in a bad position.
technologies: (All technologies of "Streaming with web camera" project below)

list.name: Streaming with web camera
list.description:
This is a project that allows you to stream your webcam with replay video stored on server.
That is the small part of a bigger project that I am working on at school.

list.name: Atelier 1 - Photomedia
list.description:
You know Pinterest ? This is a little clone of it. You can publish your own pictures and watch other people's pictures.
You can also create galeries or join other people's galeries and being a contributor of it.
